UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Identification of crucial residues for the antibacterial activity of the proline-rich peptide, pyrrhocoricin
Literature.Author: Kragol G, Hoffmann R, Chattergoon MA, Lovas S, Cudic M, Bulet P, Condie BA, Rosengren KJ, Montaner LJ, Otvos L Jr

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(IC50=>20µM),Agrobacterium tumefaciens(IC50=>40µM),Salmonella typhimurium(IC50=>20µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(IC50=>20µM),Haemophilus Influenzae(IC50=>20µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(IC50=>20µM),Staphylococcus aureus(IC50=>20µM)
